item.title: New casual mode 10/10 must implement
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Oh, I know.

Only limited to the DLC, which is 1 dollars for buying but cost 9.99 dollars per day to maintain it.

And the rotation only happen 1 per year only.

item.title: New casual mode 10/10 must implement
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
At some point I’d like to see a sort of crazy mode which changes weekly on a rota, each with a different funny gimick or mode. There are much more important things right now though, but hopefully that sort of thing is at least on the Dev’s radar.

Read full topic
